text: Adudagi Jisuna mahakki tung-inbasing adubu kouraduna hairak-i, “Eina miyam asigidamak nungsiba pokle, maramdi eihakka loinana makhoina numit humni leiminnare aduga houjik makhoigi chananaba karisu leitre. Aduga eina makhoibu kari amata pijadana thadokkhiba pamde adu nattrabadi makhoi lambida wantharakpasu yai.”
